vlive.english: What's this? It's moving. Is it "Night at the Museum?"

examples.korean: I use so much energy in kinetic activities that I get easily exhausted. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 움직이는 데 너무 많은 에너지를 사용해 쉽게 지친다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: I use so much energy in kinetic activities that I get easily exhausted. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It takes a month for a sloth to move 1 kilometer! Sloths got their name from their slow movement. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나무늘보가 1킬로미터 움직이는 데 한 달이 걸릴 정도이다! 나무늘보는 이렇게 느리게 움직여서 이런 이름을 갖게 되었다. Neungyule
examples.english: It takes a month for a sloth to move 1 kilometer! Sloths got their name from their slow movement. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has a carpal injury and moves her wrist with difficulty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 손목 관절을 다쳐서 손목을 움직이는데 힘이 든다. Neungyule
examples.english: She has a carpal injury and moves her wrist with difficulty. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is powered by four electric motors and scientists say that it can fly both day and night using the 24,000 solar cells in its high-performance batteries. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 비행기는 4개의 전기 모터로 움직이는데 과학자들은 고성능 배터리의 태양광 전지 24000개를 통해 밤낮을 쉬지 않고 날 수 있다고 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: It is powered by four electric motors and scientists say that it can fly both day and night using the 24,000 solar cells in its high-performance batteries. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It took time to work through Europe's slowcoach political system and needed a new generation of political leaders like Britain's Tony Blair and Germany's Gerhard Schroder to do the heavy lifting, but as Bill Clinton kisses power goodbye, his ideas are gaining increasing influence in Europe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마차처럼 속도가 느린 유럽의 정치제도를 움직이는 데에는 시간이 걸렸고, 영국의 토니 블레어나 독일의 케르하르트 슈뢰더 같은 정치적 지도자가 무거운 짐(유럽의 정치관행)을 들어올리기에는 새로운 세대가 필요했다. 하지만 빌 클린턴이 대통령직에서 퇴임함에 따라 그의 의견은 유럽에서 영향력이 높아져 갔다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It took time to work through Europe's slowcoach political system and needed a new generation of political leaders like Britain's Tony Blair and Germany's Gerhard Schroder to do the heavy lifting, but as Bill Clinton kisses power goodbye, his ideas are gaining increasing influence in Europe. Add to Wordbook
